title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view is resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127 (this issue does not happen on build 20011116 on Windows NT 2000), the tool items move below the label. However, the pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) also move down. This movement can confuse users.
SR: To reproduce this issue:  1. Open the Navigator view.  2. Resize the view smaller on Linux, running build 20011127.  Observe that the tool items move below the label. The pulldown menu icon (triangle) and the close icon (X) also move down.
